text: Amidon ( ) is a city in, and the county seat of Slope County, North Dakota, United States. Amidon was the smallest incorporated county seat in the 2000 census. The 2020 census reported its population as 24. It is named after Charles F. Amidon, a judge. ==History== Amidon was founded in 1910. ==References== Category:Cities in North Dakota Category:County seats in North Dakota
title: Amidon, North Dakota
